document.full_text: mexican police said on friday they captured a suspected drug kingpin from the gulf drug cartel during what authorities believe was his own birthday party in a city along the u.s.-mexican border.
document.title: mexican drug cartel boss caught at birthday party
lines_and_colors: mexican police said on friday they captured a suspected drug kingpin from the gulf drug cartel during what authorities believe was his own birthday party in a city along the u.s.-mexican border.
